title:
Dill Pickle Bites
Source: Adapted from Allrecipes.com
(Printable recipe) Tracey Harrelson
directions: in a small mixing bowl, combine cream cheese, mayonnaise, grated onion, dill weed, and pepper. Mix until well combined.

Cut crusts from bread slices and roll each slice flat with a rolling pin. Spread cream cheese mixture thinly on the bread slices, using approximately one tablespoon mixture per bread slice. Place a baby dill pickle on each and roll up.*
Place seam side down in a glass baking dish. Cover and chill in the refrigerator 8 hours, or overnight.
To serve, cut each pickle roll into three pieces.
ingredients: 12 slices white bread {or white whole wheat}
